TextLibrary.Text: That Troll was tough! You will need to enter the cave again.
You wrap the Ice Troll in cloth to take back to Drong.
Drong gives you finely crafted magical staff.
You must travel to the Troll Hole, north of Theira in search of an Ice Troll.
You must return the Ice Troll to Drong's Tower.
Ice Trolls live in the cold northern areas. They can Freeze their foes.
